extendedInfo.description: *** Ad-free, priority support ***Stay connected to your coworkers wherever you go with an innovative user interface that leverages the powerful capabilities of Android! QuipIM uses your existing data connection to connect you to your company's Sametime community without SMS charges.QuipIM allows you to connect directly to your Lotus Sametime server without any extra server software.QuipIM places all its focus on the IBM Lotus Sametime experience on Android and iPhone rather than trying to force a wide array of different IM services into a single package. Our commitment is to provide an easy, clean, and intuitive interface for business partners to communicate at home, in meetings, and on the road.Features include:- Manage your connections to multiple accounts.- Manage your buddy list, including adding and removing buddies and groups.- Easily switch between active conversations using a swipe.- Set your status and a custom status message.- Easily access and manage your conversation history.- View real-time updates on the status of your buddies.- Easily access and manage your conversation history.

reviews.title: save account issue on jelly bean
reviews.comment: does not save your sametime user account between reboots on jelly bean, you have to recreate your account after each reboot. Tried contacting the developer for support, no response.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs prettier UI
reviews.comment: Love the app guys! Works great! But could we work on the graphics a bit? Extra graphics pack? Feels like I\'m in the 90\'s...Galaxy S2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seems to be broken on Jellybean. Accounts lost after reboot or just open with black screen, no response or crashes. I paid for this, so please fix.
reviews.author: Morten Klisch

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Works once or twice but then you just get a black screen and have to clear data to use it again.
reviews.author: Jake Camp

reviews.title: Not fully working
reviews.comment: It has problems on jelly bean....no sound when someone ping u ...also it is not saving the account info after reboot. .....problems has to be solved ...till then only one star
reviews.author: gangadhar gandrakota

reviews.title: Todd
reviews.comment: Works great! I will give it five stars when we can set which notification tone it uses.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not reliable
reviews.comment: Constantly having to re-enter my logon information and server name is pretty annoying. Other than that, it seems to work.
reviews.author: David Worrell

reviews.title: Do not download...SCAM
reviews.comment: This company is terrible. The free app didn\'t even work after using it for a week or so. I tried to contact their support team several times and NEVER got a response.  I decided to buy the paid app as I need this service for work. The paid app had the exact same issue.  After that I tried to call their support number (which also happens to be the only number they provide on their website) every day for a couple weeks. Not once did they pick up and NOT ONCE did they ever return a call or email although they
reviews.author: Jeff Urbin

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Works randomly....week open one time, then another time it will not work with a connection error and i have to reboot phone to reset it...other than that, great to use
reviews.author: Venice Walton

reviews.comment: Works perfectly for me to connect to sametime on our Domino 8.5 servers. This is NOT a traveller client for use with notes traveller.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I NEED MY MONEY BACK
reviews.comment: Been a couple of weeks now. No responses for my e-mail\'s and voice messages. Does not work on my android phone. I NEED MY MONEY BACK
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works. But crashes frequently.
reviews.comment: Easy to setup and get going. But it crashes frequently. Especially when you\'re chatting with someone. That\'s a big downer. These folks don\'t respond to emails. So fixes and releases don\'t look promising. If you\'re looking for something to keep you online when away from pc, go for it. Otherwise, stick to the free version.  ( Xperia)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So far...good.
reviews.comment: Add preference to hide notification status when logged in...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Excellent
reviews.author: Giovanni Ferretti

reviews.title: If you use IBM Sametime, this is the client you should use.
reviews.comment: This sametime client is the only real option for Android.  The IBM version has issues, and your IT department probably doesn\'t want to put in the extra equipment to make it work.  QuipIM works out of the box, no changes.  That\'s worth it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix the lost settings on reboot.
reviews.comment: If they\'d fix the fact that the settings  get lost Everytime you reboot I\'d rate 5 stars.   I\'ve emailed 5 or 6 times and gotten no response.  Ever.
reviews.author: Rick Murrow

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: Great as long as it works.  Will not load sometimes and have  uninstall and reinstall. Sometimes losses settings.
reviews.author: roxanne thornton

reviews.title: Works once, reboot required to use again
reviews.comment: Moto droid 4 ics.  The first time you open the app, it works. The second time you get a data connection available error which clears after rebooting the phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working on Samsung Note
reviews.comment: Does not work on Android 4.0.4 - never connects to server. Works on HTC Desire  though. Technical support never bothered to reply to my query about this issue on Samsung Note.
reviews.author: Aidas Jasilionis

reviews.title: Works for IBM Employees ?
reviews.comment: Reviews show that folks got this to at least work (ie: didn\'t get the \"host is unreachable\" error). For those that did, I wonder if they are actual IBM employees. The doc shows 4 ways to connect (other than to \"messaging.xxxxx, port 1533\") but are not practical. Does this work with Notes Traveler for Android ? Good program if it works.
reviews.author: A Google User
